RASPA2
======

# Available modules


The overview below shows which RASPA2 installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using RASPA2, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load RASPA2/2.0.41-foss-2020b
```
